comments: Goel is an overall great professor! She tries her best to make the material clear and interesting. She is definitely willing to help each student to the best of her ability. Hw is minimal, but I believe it is important to study on your own time in order to keep up with the material. Take Goel!!

I was excited to take this class. However, the program we use is horrible. Prof Goel really wants you to succeed. She is the best Prof that teaches this class. She often assigns 10 multiple choice questions. It is rather difficult to understand her at times & I often ask her to repeat herself.

I would definitely recommend taking her! She does have an accent but it is not hard to get used to. The class itself is a hard one anyways and she is always willing to help you out if you need it. If you don\'t do well on the tests the group project and extra credit brings your grade up
Enjoyed the class, sometimes chapters were unclear and not explained well, but overall good.
DO NOT TAKE! This is the hardest ACCT305 class by far. Very Slow! Erases all the time. Tests are difficult.
not helpful. very heavy accent which makes class hard to follow. a lot of work require. always keeps class overtime
Professor goel is awesome. She is very clear with the material and gives wicked good review sheets before each test.
Professor goel is an awsome teacher. She is very clear with the material and gives wicked good review sheets.

Goel gives you the test. If you are halfway intelligent and pay attention in class, not much time outside is needed. I\'ve taken almost all accounting professors @ siena and she\'s your best bet for an A.

She is a great lady, very helpful, it is not that hard to understand her as kids are saying. basically gives you what will be on test and also gives take home quizes to bring grade up. if you keep up and study before test you will do fine

DO NOT TAKE! This is the hardest ACCT class by far. It is hard to understand what she is even talking about and sometimes it doesn\'t appear she even knows what she is doing when she erases the board 100x and has to correct it... When the class average is failing she tells us we need to work harder and there is no reason everyone can\'t get a 100.

She is very friendly and helpful, but can be confusing and hard to understand the first few weeks until you get use to her accent. The labs are tough if you dont use the answers on blackboard and the quizzes are easy. Tests require a lot of studying, but who expects to get a good grade in accounting with out studying a lot?

if you need at least a c-, don\'t take her. homework and labs are easy because the answers are on blackboard, but her tests are ridiculous. seeing her during her office hours are pointless, cause you can\' understand what she\'s saying nor read her writing. i ended up with a D and have to retake the class. don\'t bother taking her.
